about_the_game:
BLAST MONSTERS -> WIN LOOT -> GET SWAG

Collect five classes of swag with three tiers of strength, from single use special items, to offensive and defensive abilities, temporary and permenant buffs, and follower options. Accumulate different power-ups of swag (full game has 108 collectibles), many stacking onto each another to increase effectiveness.

COSPLAY YOUR CHARACTERS

Choose from 3 different cosplaying characters in the demo(8 full game), each with differing stats, standard attacks, special attacks and escape abilities. Find the character that suits your own play-style, from fast moving long-ranged attacker to brute force melee tank and everything in between.

DEMO THE FIRST LEVEL OF TWIN-STICK CATGIRL CARNAGE (or you can use keyboard and/or mouse)

Full game has 10 levels, with each level is guarded by it's own set of monsters - all under the power of the level boss. Activate the level nodes, defeat the boss and flee to the exit - all whilst grabbing as much loot and unlocking as much swag as possible.

SINGLE PLAYER OR CO-OP

Solo it as a one catgirl army or team up on-line (or LAN) for 3 player co-op (4 in full game) murderous mayhem!

content_descriptors.notes: Monsters explode, some gibs, some blood decals.

name: Monsters Loot Swag Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: BLAST MONSTERS -> WIN LOOT -> GET SWAG. Demo the first level of this top-down, twin-stick, power-up collectathon shooter.
